channel.title: JTF News - Just The Facts
channel.description: Verified facts from multiple sources. No opinions. No adjectives. No interpretation. Viewer-supported at github.com/sponsors/larryseyer

item.title: Over 6,000 people killed in a Sudanese city during a three-day period, according...

item.title: Secretary of State Marco Rubio characterized the United States as a critical fri...
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio characterized the United States as a critical friend to allies. Iran and the United States are scheduled to hold nuclear talks in Geneva, according to a Swiss government official. Secretary of State Marco Rubio plans to visit eastern Europe. Russia claims to have captured a dozen Ukrainian villages ahead of the talks. stated that Washington does not need vassals but strong partners.
